notes.title: The Power of Kindness
notes.content: Kindness is a language that the deaf can hear and the blind can see.

notes.title: Growth and Change
notes.content: The only constant in life is change. Embrace it and let it guide your growth.

notes.title: Mindfulness and Presence
notes.content: Be present in every moment and cherish the small things in life.

notes.title: Gratitude
notes.content: Gratitude turns what we have into enough and more.

notes.title: Resilience
notes.content: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
